reviewText: Has anyone tried to purchase the DVD and a region 2 dvd player? My granddaughters love the movie. We had recorded it but lost it! Can't explain this to a 3 year old!
My son loved this when we saw it on Netflix, and keeps asking for it.  He "settles" for the unicorn sequel, but it is not as good.

Princess Lillifee and Princess Lillifee and the Unicorn are both available on the Stars (On Demand, Comcast Cable) for free (as long as you have a subscription) under Stars Kids.  It will remain available for a good long time, it seems; the original until December 31 of this year, and the Unicorn one until October of 2013!  Good news for searching parents. ^_^
My daughter also still mentions Lillifee and how sad she feels that it is no longer available on Netflix. I still search for an USA formatted version. Hoping...!!
I agree with the first reviewer, my daughter watched this on netflix streaming and got hooked, now it is off netflix and I am trying to find a DVD to purchase.
My daughter Eris has watched this movie and the sequel on Netflix several times this week. Will this dvd be coming out in Region 1 format?
